channel.title: Rune-Reveal Needs your help! (looking for educated website designers)
channel.description:
Before you put in your application I should tell you a little bit about myself. I am an experienced and knowledgeable server owner. I am currently 16 years old, but I like to believe I'm wise beyond my years.
Application format Skype: Estimated time of experience: Programming languages?: What can you offer us that others may no be able to?:

item.title: Rune-Reveal Needs your help! (looking for educated website designers)
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

Ruby:

Tell everyone more about the server rather than this. You say you are experienced, knowledgeable and wise beyond your years; yet you only write 3 minutes worth of a post to recruit an educated website designer? At what point do you expect to get a decent website designer to work for your server when you can’t take more than 5 minutes of your time to try and recruit them?

You’re right, I’ll update the thread right now.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune-Reveal Needs your help! (looking for educated website designers)
